description: Toulmin Argument Template Library for Doctoral-Level Argumentation

examples: The plan DOES establish comprehensive baseline documentation for D1
The plan DOES demonstrate clear budgetary allocations for D2
The plan PARTIALLY establishes baseline documentation for D1
The plan PARTIALLY demonstrates budgetary allocations for D2

negative.template: The plan DOES NOT adequately {achievement} for {dimension}
examples: The plan DOES NOT adequately establish baseline documentation for D1
The plan DOES NOT adequately demonstrate budgetary allocations for D2

causal: Given that {ground}, and considering {principle}, it follows that
Because {ground}, and in accordance with {standard}, we conclude that
Since {evidence} demonstrates {pattern}, and evaluation criteria require {requirement}, therefore
evidential: Based on {ground}, and aligned with {requirement}, this demonstrates that
The evidence shows {finding}, which, when evaluated against {standard}, indicates that
Analysis reveals {pattern}, and comparison with {benchmark} shows that
logical: If {condition}, then {consequence}, and given {evidence}, it follows that
The presence of {element_a} combined with {element_b} logically implies that
From {premise_1} and {premise_2}, we can deduce that

backing_templates.secondary_evidence: Additional support from {source} ({evidence_type}, confidence: {confidence}) corroborates this assessment
backing_templates.convergent_sources: Independent verification from {source} identifies {finding}, reinforcing the primary conclusion
backing_templates.quantitative_support: Quantitative analysis from {source} reveals {metric}, providing numerical backing for the assessment

rebuttal_templates.handle_uncertainty: Notwithstanding {uncertainty_source}, the convergence of {evidence_count} independent sources provides

synthesis_templates.multi_source: Synthesizing across {source_count} independent analytical modules and {type_count} evidence types reveals convergent support
synthesis_templates.triangulation: The triangulation of evidence from {sources} demonstrates consistency in the evaluation
synthesis_templates.integration: Integration of {evidence_types} across {dimensions} provides comprehensive justification

confidence_statement_templates.narrow_interval: The Bayesian posterior analysis yields a mean estimate of {mean:.2f} with a 95% credible interval of [{lower:.2f}, {upper:.2f}], representing a narrow credible interval indicating high precision
confidence_statement_templates.moderate_interval: The Bayesian posterior analysis yields a mean estimate of {mean:.2f} with a 95% credible interval of [{lower:.2f}, {upper:.2f}], representing a moderate credible interval reflecting reasonable certainty
confidence_statement_templates.wide_interval: The Bayesian posterior analysis yields a mean estimate of {mean:.2f} with a 95% credible interval of [{lower:.2f}, {upper:.2f}], representing a wide credible interval suggesting substantial uncertainty

D1.name: Diagnóstico
D1.evaluation_standards: requires documented baseline measurements with quantitative metrics and temporal references

D2.name: Diseño del PDM
D2.evaluation_standards: requires clear objectives with measurable indicators and allocated resources

D3.name: Implementación
D3.evaluation_standards: requires specific activities with timelines and assigned responsibilities

D4.name: Resultados
D4.evaluation_standards: requires measurable outputs and deliverables with verification mechanisms

D5.name: Impactos
D5.evaluation_standards: requires analysis of long-term effects and sustainability considerations

D6.name: Lógica Causal
D6.evaluation_standards: requires explicit causal logic connecting inputs to outcomes
